A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
As a massive star wars geek\, I truly don't know what the naysayers are going on about. I was entertained throughout\, and contented with all the usual SW stuff. I thought the Last Jedi was true to the series by holding on to glimmers of hope\, yet successful in not pulling off a weird rebel victory as well. It actually makes me more interested in the series overall. All other rebel victories kind of felt symbolic..

I think Luke was well portrayed\, and kicked enough butt in the end to make me feel like I was watching Yoda own count Dooku again. His actions were totally in line with previous Jedi\, but he achieved great things in the end.

It's probably more of a four star movie for me\, but desserving of the extra star to offset the horrible reviews it's getting.
